Generation VI.X: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
Generation VI.Y: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

Generation VIII.Sword: Females are a bit more selfish and aggressive than males. If they don't get what they want, they will torment you with their psychic abilities.
Generation VIII.Shield: If it doesn't hold back when it unleashes its psychic power, it can tear apart a tanker. Its unfriendliness is part of its charm.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Female Meowstic are more aggressive than males. Their expression remains blank even while they're wielding immense psychic power.
Generation IX.Violet: When they sense danger, they exert their psychic power at its maximum output. They have no regard for their opponents.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 7 , Dusty Bowl ( Male ) Watchtower Ruins , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle ) ( Male ) Evolve Espurr ♀ ( Female )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 7 , Dusty Bowl ( Female ) Watchtower Ruins , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle ) ( Female ) Evolve Espurr ♂ ( Male )
